Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Is this what you call
Huge Materia?”{PAUSE}“This is really rare
Materia, indeed.”{PAUSE}“Materia this rare is certain
to have a special consciousness
enclosed in it.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Good.
Now let's leave.”{PAUSE}“Do you remember how to use
the machine down below?
If you ever want to see Materia,
come here anytime.”

emitted a quiet glow.”

as command Materia.”
